attributes.action: pave the way for a more democratic E.U.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The E.U currently has much power over its memeber states, yet little checks and balances to safeguard improper use of such power. E.U membership is desirable and nescecary,however at present the levels of demcracy are woefuly inadequate.

rejection.details: Please state clearly in the title exactly what action you want Government to take. Also this petition looks very similar to this one http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Negotiate-EU/ and may be a repetition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
